name: footstool
description:
made for GMTK game jam 2021

* select an enemy to copy its movement!

* use the connections to traverse through 16 levels!

* look at 3 exotic hazards (phrogs, missyles and snayles!)!

* its not about completing the game, its about the connections we make along the way!

controls

W / spacebar -jump

A D - move left and right

mouse - used to select an enemy within your radius

left click - hold to make the connection with selected enemy, release to unlock the connection
